section.p: A collection of UML shapes are included. To select the required shape, click the mode white icon to display the palette of shapes. Select the shape you require and then this shape will be shown as the icon. A single click on the canvas will draw the shape the shape of a default size, drag the mouse on the canvas to create a larger shape, to maintain the aspect ratio of the shape whilst resizing, hold down the alt key.
To draw UML diagrams you will use these shapes with conjunction of the collection of line markers that are available.
